Package quarkninja.mode.xqmode

Interface Summary
CompilationCheckerInterface Interface for Compiler Class
 

Class Summary
ErrorBar The bar on the left of the text area whih displays all errors as rectangles.
ErrorCheckerService Error Checking Service for XQMode.

Program Flow:
Fetches code from editor every few seconds, converts it into pure java and runs it through the Eclipse AST parser.
ErrorMarker Error markers displayed on the Error Bar.
ErrorWindow Error Window that displays a tablular list of errors.
ImportStatement Wrapper for import statements
Problem Wrapper class for IProblem.
ProblemsFilter Makes iProblem error messages jargon free.
XQEditor Editor for XQMode
XQMode Teh XQMode
XQPreprocessor My implementation of P5 preprocessor.
XQTextArea Custom TextArea for XQMode
XQTextAreaPainter Custom painter for XQTextArea.
